# cccz

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

I am an auditor who continues to learn.

## Highlights

  * Ranked #9 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #9 on Code4rena's all-time leaderboard,
with $280k+ in awards.

  * Placed in the top 5 in over 20 Code4rena audits

Projects audited included NFTx, Maple Finance, LooksRare, PoolTogether, and
more.

## cccz's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=cccz&source=cccz-profile)

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hellocccz)
